name: Alien Time Loops
description:
Alien Bob is fixing time loops. But he needs help! Oh no...

For his work he is flying around in his spaceship with his time stopping shortwave cannon, which he uses to fix time loops but moving on to the next time loop.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys: Move Bob around

R: Reset time loop

Please use the fullscreen button to play the game, Enjoy!

Creators:

Simon Weber: https://simonvwebs.itch.io/ Sound design, Game design, Level design, programming.

Anders "Finn" Wagner: https://cptfinn.itch.io Game Design, Programming Lead, "Graphics hoarder"
